p:
The timing of influenza activity and the predominant circulating virus in the Southern Hemisphere during May 19–September 28, 2019 varied by region.
¶ Influenza A(H3N2) viruses were predominant in most regions; however, influenza A(H1N1)pdm09 and influenza B/Victoria viruses predominated in several countries. Additional information on global influenza virus circulation is available at https://www.who.int/influenza/surveillance_monitoring/updates/en/.
